description: Mall automation unit assigned to Retailstar Interchange. Handles lore sync, metadata rotation, and domain reclassification.
loreTasks: Update domain avatars and descriptions via SNS
Reclassify domains into Flash Rack, Mid Tier, or Premium Wing
Push metadata changes to @retailstarsol via webhook or quote tweet
Run SNS scripts securely on dev PC using local keypair
Announce lore shifts (e.g. 'jpegdealer.sol moved from Flash Rack to Mid Tier')
Execute automated rotation timers based on domain categories

domains.name: jpegdealer
domains.description: The JPEG Dealer's Code - Middleman of JPEG euphoria. Always has 'just one more' rare in stock.
domains.lore: Once a lowkey plug, now a full-blown middleman of JPEG euphoria. This shop emerged during peak mint season when liquidity was loose and everyone knew a guy.

domains.name: fudscience
domains.description: The FUD Science Manifesto - Satirical alpha report you read ironically until it hits.
domains.lore: Born in the FOMO labs of Crypto Twitter, fudscience.sol is the satirical alpha report you read ironically—until it hits.

domains.name: jumpsetradio
domains.description: The Sonic Kiosk Manifesto - Broadcasting from the neon alleys of Retailstar Mall.
domains.lore: Broadcasting from the neon alleys of Retailstar Mall, Jumpset Radio is a relic of 90s underground rhythm, wrapped in Solana static.

domains.name: copevendor
domains.description: The Cope Vendor's Pharmacy - Stocked with hopium pills and false hope like hotcakes.
domains.lore: In the ruins of high-entry bags, copevendor.sol set up shop. Stocked with hopium pills, Hopeless Opium™ candles, and 'GM will fix it' posters.

domains.name: commandhub
domains.description: The Command Hub Protocol - Mainframe for deployment, control, and cold precision.
domains.lore: Deep inside the Retailstar grid, a terminal flickers. The devs who know, know. commandhub.sol isn't just a site—it's the mainframe for deployment.

domains.name: bidgremlin
domains.description: The Bid Gremlin's Den - Where every bid is a gamble and every auction is a story.
domains.lore: In the shadowy corners of the Retailverse, the Bid Gremlin lurks, waiting for the perfect moment to strike.

domains.name: deploydeck
domains.description: The Deploy Deck - Where launches become legends and deployments become destiny.
domains.lore: Every deployment is a roll of the dice, every launch a leap of faith. The Deploy Deck is where legends are born.

domains.name: rigbuilder
domains.description: The Rig Builder's Workshop - Crafting the tools that power the Retailverse.
domains.lore: In the depths of the digital forge, the Rig Builder crafts the tools that power the Retailverse.

domains.name: lurkerlife
domains.description: The Lurker Life - Where observation becomes art and patience becomes power.
domains.lore: Sometimes the best strategy is to watch, wait, and strike when the moment is perfect.
